data.productName: MSI PRO MP242C 23.6 FHD Curved Monitor with Built-in Speakers
data.description: The Colorful GeForce RTX 3060 NB DUO 8GB-V Graphics Card is powered by the award-winning NVIDIA Turing architecture, bringing superfast all-around performance and graphics to every gamer and creator. It's time to gear up and get superpowers. It has a Dual Fan design that offers double the cooling performance.
